category.text: $module$/Default for Question Practice Demonstration/QuestionPracticeEnglishLanguageDemo/English language core Moodle question types

questiontext.text: At the party all the {1:MULTICHOICE:~%100%children~childs} wore a badge. I made sandwiches and used three {1:MULTICHOICE:~%100%loafs~loaves} of bread. Two of the {1:MULTICHOICE:~%100%women~womens} who worked at the bakers delivered cakes.

I searched  {1:MULTICHOICE:~%100%for~during~while} and hour but I never {1:MULTICHOICE:~%100%found~find#No that is not the past tense~finded#Find is irregular and cannot be put in the past tense by adding ed at the end}
